testcase.name: Sending request to the Brand
testcase.system-out: Given user launch the browser and Maximize window...........................passed When to hit the Shopdot Url.................................................passed And user login to the Shopdot Application...................................passed And click on the Brands menu................................................passed And the user is on the Brand Listing page...................................passed And user select a Brands and click on the connect button....................passed And displays the sucessful message "Connect Request Sent Successfully!".....passed And click on the close button in the popup..................................passed Then Status changes to "Pending"............................................passed
